about: Software has eaten the world â€“ this site is just my proof that it has eaten me too. If we've never met, my name is Chris Bolton. I'm currently studying at UBC in business and computer science and I love exploring where technology intersects with society. To learn more about what I do and what I care about, be sure to review some of my past and present projects below. If you're up for a chat, check out the links above.
